title: Serial Werearsonist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stab someone each night. You'll also maul their other visitors, and douse their visitors' visitors.
- Ignite all doused players at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stabbing is a Basic attack, mauling is a Powerful attack, and igniting is an Unstoppable attack.
- If you're roleblocked, you'll stab yourself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill Kill Kill all who would oppose you.
